net.shadowfacts.config

Interface ConfigTypeAdapter<C,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - The Configuration type
    V - The Value type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TypesafeTypeAdapter<C,V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanAdapter, BooleanArrayAdapter, BoxedBooleanArrayAdapter, BoxedDoubleArrayAdapter, BoxedIntegerArrayAdapter, BoxedLongArrayAdapter, DoubleAdapter, DoubleArrayAdapter, IntegerAdapter, IntegerArrayAdapter, LongAdapter, LongArrayAdapter, NumberAdapter, NumberArrayAdapter, StringAdapter, StringArrayAdapter

    public interface ConfigTypeAdapter<C,V>
    An adapter for loading properties from configurations

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      V load(java.lang.String category, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, ConfigWrapper<C> config, V value)
      Saves a value to the config

    • Method Detail

      • load

        V load(java.lang.String category,
       java.lang.String name,
       java.lang.String description,
       ConfigWrapper<C> config,
       V value)
throws ConfigException
        Saves a value to the config
        Parameters:
        category - The property category
        name - The property name
        description - The property description/comment
        config - The configuration object
        value - The value to use if the config object doesn't contain the value
        Returns:
        The result
        Throws:
        ConfigException - If there's a problem loading the configuration property
